View on GitHub

KGQA-leaderboard

Repository to track the progress in Question Answering over Knowledge Graphs (KGQA), including the datasets and the current state-of-the-art for the most common KGQA tasks.

SimpleQuestionsWikidata

SimpleQuestionsWikidata[1] is a version of the SimpleQuestions dataset mapped to Wikidata.

This dataset can be downloaded via the link.

Leaderboard

Model / System Year Precision Recall F1 Language Reported by
STaG-QA_pre [1] 2021 60.2 63.2 61.7 EN Ravishankar et al.
STaG-QA [2] 2021 59.4 62.7 60.1 EN Ravishankar et al.
SYGMA [3] 2021 42 55 44 EN Neelam S et al
MemNN 2021 - - - EN Oliya A et al
KBQA-Adapter 2021 - - - EN Oliya A et al
Rigel-Baseline 2021 - - - EN Oliya A et al
Rigel-ER 2021 - - - EN Oliya A et al
Rigel-E2E 2021 - - - EN Oliya A et al
Rigel-E2E 2021 - - - EN Thomas Goette
Aqqu Wikidata (rules) 2021 - - - EN Thomas Goette
Aqqu Wikidata (learned) [4] 2021 - - - EN Thomas Goette
  • [1] wikidata 03/2020.
  • [2] wikidata 03/2020.
  • [3] wikidata version not stated.
  • [4] Wikidata dump 2021-06-10.

References

[1] Diefenbach, Dennis, Thomas Tanon, Kamal Singh, and Pierre Maret. Question answering benchmarks for wikidata. In ISWC 2017. 2017.
